team13.cmput301.recipefinder.controllers

Class RecipeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • team13.cmput301.recipefinder.controllers.RecipeManager

  • public class RecipeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton that manages all the user's recipes, including their own and ones that were downloaded. Also keeps track of favourite recipes. CMPUT301 W13 T13
    Author:
    Han (Jim) Wen, Jessica Yuen, Shen Wei Liao, Fangyu Li
